plugin.name: InguzEQ
plugin.title: SqueezeboxEQ
plugin.desc: DSP for Squeezebox server based off InguzDSP
plugin.creator: Jonathan Fox
plugin.changes: Split templates for config into separate file, and plugin now detects when the template has changed and re-writes config based off this. Amended template for flac and added in wmal setting for 24 bit.
